channel.title: Projects on Rohan's Engineering Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Rohan's Engineering Portfolio

item.title: FTC Robotics, Year 1
item.description:
Objective Primary: Quickly pick up cones and score them on low, medium, and high junctions. Autonomous: Score pre-loaded cone, detect randomized signal sleeve, and park reliably. Driver-Controlled: Enable driver to score as many cones as possible in 2 minutes, prioritizing speed and ease of use.

Design Process Identified the need for a holonomic drivetrain for agility, leading to the selection of a Mecanum Drive. Determined that a multi-stage Cascading Linear Lift (Viper Slide) would provide the necessary reach and stability to score on the high junction
